Detailed Description

The FXS Interface. When the platform is with virtual DAA, the FXS interface is used.

FXS-Ring

As a caller, an FXS device initials a call by passing ring voltage over the line to the attached FXO device. As a callee, an FXS device receives a call by detecting the line that has been seized.
The function of rtk_SetRingFxs sets the FXS to ring. The parameter of bRinging is either 0 or 1 (silence or ring).
The function of rtk_SetSlicRingCadence sets the period of cadence on and period of cadence off. This function should use with the function rtk_SetRingFxs.

Figure 13. Set the cadence and ring the phone 

 
rtk_SetSlicRingCadence(0, 2000, 4000);  // 2 sec ON, 4 sec OFF
rtk_SetRingFXS(0, 1);   // enable ring

Function Documentation

int32 rtk_SetFlashHookTime ( uint32  chid,
uint32  min_time,
uint32  max_time 
)

Setup the flash hook time.

Flash hook or hookflash simulates quickly hanging up then picking up again.
This api is used to set a time period of a quick off-hook/on-hook/off-hook cycle.

This action can signal the telephone exchange to do something.
A common use of hook flash is to switch to another incoming call with the call waiting service. Another use is to indicate a request for voice conferencing.

If on-hook time period between min_time and max_time detected by FXS will be treated as a flash-hook event.
If time period is large than max_time, it will triggers on_hook event to upper application.

Parameters
chidThe channel number.
min_timeThe min hang up time period for flash hook. (Unit: ms)
max_timeThe max hang up time period for flash hook. (Unit: ms)
Return values
0Success
Examples:
conference.c, custom_tone.c, fxo.c, and phone.c.
int32 rtk_SetRingFxs ( uint32  chid,
uint32  bRinging 
)

Enable/Diable FXS Ringing.

Enable/Disable to Start/Stop Ringer on a specific FXS line.

Parameters
chidThe FXS channel number.
bRinging0: Disable the FXS ringing.
1: Enable the FXS ringing.
Return values
0Success
Examples:
caller_id.c, fxo.c, proslic_set.c, and ring.c.
int32 rtk_DisableRingFxs ( int  bDisable)

Disable all FXS Ring.

When this api is invoked with parameter bDisable = 1, all request from rtk_SetRingFxs() will be permanently ignored until this api is being invoked again with parameter bDisable = 0.
rtk_DisableRingFxs() has higher priority than rtk_SetRingFxs().

Parameters
bDisableflag to disable all FXS Ring.
0: No action.
1: Disable all FXS ringing.
Return values
0Success
Note
Test Issue.

int32 rtk_SetSlicRingFreqAmp ( uint32  chid,
uint8  preset 
)

Set the ring frequency and amplitude of FXS.

Many of ring frequencies and amplitudes have presents that are available for easily using.
You can select theindex from the preset table.

Parameters
chidThe FXS channel number.
presetThe Ring frequency, amplitude preset table index.
Note
The preset table depends on various SLIC vendor.
Return values
0Success
int32 rtk_SetSlicLineVoltage ( uint32  chid,
uint8  flag 
)

Set SLIC line voltage.

Parameters
chidThe channel number
flagSLIC line voltage flag.
0: zero voltage. SLIC port is deny of service.
1: normal voltage. Put SLIC to On-Hook tranmission state.
2: reverse voltage. Put SLIC to Polarity Reversal On-Hook tranmission state.
Return values
0Success
int32 rtk_GenSlicCpc ( uint32  chid,
uint32  cpc_ms 
)

Generate SLIC CPC signal.

CPC (Calling Party Control) or Open Loop Disconnect is a signal sent by a FXS device and received by a FXO device, to indicate that the calling party has hung up.

A wink function slowly ramps down the TIP-RING voltage (VTR) to zero followed by a return to the original on-hook open-circuit dc voltage value. (from Si32178 datasheet)

Don't confuse CPC with Battery Reversal.

Parameters
chidThe channel number
cpc_msSLIC CPC signal period
Unit: ms
Note
only supported by Silab SLIC currently.
Return values
0Success
int32 rtk_SetCountryImpedance ( _COUNTRY_  country)

Set the SLIC/DAA impedance according to the selected country.

Parameters
countryThe selected country.
Note
rtk_SetCountryImpedance provides the country-specific impedance setting (Not include tone).
Return values
0Success
int32 rtk_SetImpedance ( uint16  preset)

Set the SLIC impedance from the preset table.

Parameters
presetThe preset table index.

preset index AC Impedance
0 600 ohm
1 900 ohm
2 250 ohm + (750 ohm || 150nf)
3 320 ohm + (1150 ohm || 230nf)
4 350 ohm + (1000 ohm || 210nf)
Note
rtk_SetImpedance provides five fixed AC impedance.
Return values
0Success
int rtk_SetFxsOnHookTransPcmOn ( unsigned int  chid)

Set FXS On Hook Transmission and turn On PCM channel for data transfer
This API has two actions.

  1. Set FXS line to on hook data transmission state.
  2. Enabling pcm channel according to chid.

    Analogue on-hook data transmission is a technique which enables information to be transmitted to the called party from the exchange(FXS).
Parameters
chidSLIC channel ID
Return values
0Success
Examples:
caller_id.c.
int32 rtkSetProslicParam ( uint32  chid,
ProslicType  slic_type,
ProslicParamType  param_type,
void *  pParam,
uint32  param_size 
)

Set the Silab Proslic parameters, such as Ring, DC Feed, Impedance, etc.

Parameters
chidThe FXS channel number.
slic_typeThe SLIC type, ex: Si3226x, Si3217x. See ProslicType.
param_typeThe parameter type, ex: Ring, Impedance. See ProslicParamType.
pParamThe Proslic paramter pointer.
param_sizeThe paramters size in byte.
Note
Currently, it only supports SLIC type Si3226x, and paramter type: Ring, DC Feed, and impedance.
Return values
0Success
Examples:
proslic_set.c.
